tool_description: Calculates natural frequencies, mode shapes, and modal properties of structural systems for dynamic analysis.

mass_matrix.description: Diagonal terms of lumped mass matrix in kg

stiffness_matrix.description: Diagonal terms of stiffness matrix in N/m

error_messages: Matrix size mismatch: Mass and stiffness arrays must have same length representing DOF count.
Invalid matrix values: Mass and stiffness values must be positive. Check structural model.
Too many modes requested: Number of modes cannot exceed degrees of freedom.
Numerical instability: Check for very small stiffness or very large mass values.
usage: Input diagonal terms of mass and stiffness matrices from structural model. For simplified analysis, use lumped masses at floor levels and story stiffnesses. Tool extracts specified number of vibration modes.

natural_frequencies.description: Natural frequencies in Hz for each mode

natural_periods.description: Natural periods in seconds for each mode

participation_factors.description: Modal participation factors for lateral direction
